Texto: 
surgical resection with follow-up chemotherapy.
axial ct images of the chest demonstrate a right upper lobe pulmonary nodule with smaller satellite lesions, very concerning for malignancy.
adenocarcinoma of the lung
primary lung carcinoma
metastatic disease
infection
58 y/o male with pulmonary nodule seen on recent virtual colonoscopy.  patient was a twenty year smoker of roughly half a pack a day, quit in 1990.
